snippet.title: SNES Super Bomberman 3
snippet.description: Super Bomberman 3 was, strangely, only released in Japan and Europe. Its a remix version of Bomberman 93 from the Pc Engine, with loads of new features to the series, such as 5 player support (a first on SNES), revenge bomber (being able to still throw bombs in the game field after deah) and the Rooeys, the Kanguru like creatures that you will see being used in death match mode. Brilliant, one of my favorites from the series.
